about_the_game:
In eXoSpace, you embark on a bounty hunt through the most dangerous parts of the galaxy. Only your spaceship design and piloting skills, along with your ability to make tough decisions, will keep you alive.

Every hyperjump brings a new and potentially deadly encounter—or perhaps a friendly trader or an alien in need of help. Adapt your spaceship design on the fly using the resources and module blueprints you collect. And if you manage to reach your target, an intense boss fight awaits.

Design your ultimate warship with the easy-to-use ship editor. Optimize your vessel by balancing key elements like thrusters, armor, weapon placement, energy management, moving parts, and more. The editor is intuitive yet offers plenty of depth. The ship designer is gridless, and allows you to connect modueles in any orientation.

Choose from a vast array of modules—including pistons and rotators for dynamic, physical functionality. The possibilities are endless: build a sleek, high-tech interceptor, a heavily armored battlecruiser, or even a space shark that really bites. Anything goes, as long as it helps you get your bounty.

Pilot your ship in intense, real-time, physics-based battles. Every individual module of a ship can be destroyed, allowing you to break off entire sections of enemy vessels. But not every encounter leads to combat—sometimes, the right choices may help you avoid a fight you can't win or earn the aid of a friendly alien.

Become a bounty hunter and choose your next target from the galaxy’s most wanted list. Your journey will take you on an adventure where every encounter presents a unique challenge—often with multiple possible outcomes.

Upgrade your spaceship by collecting new module blueprints, gathering resources, and refining your ship’s design. Don’t run out of fuel, or you may find yourself at the mercy of whoever discovers you. And if you manage to reach your target, a challenging boss fight awaits.

  • No two playthroughs are the same. Each mission presents a randomized map, new enemies, unique events, and unexpected outcomes.

  • A powerful yet user-friendly gridless ship editor. Place modules in any orientation, paint them individually in any color, fine-tune controls for each module, and test your design against any ship you've encountered to ensure it performs well.

  • Hundreds of module blueprints to discover, including pistons, rotators, and game-changing unique modules. How you place these modules—and where—determines your ship's effectiveness.

  • Sandbox mode where you can build ships using any module previously encountered, and spawn ships or any design you have seen in-game (including bosses)

  • Extensive modding support for spaceship modules, AI scripts, encounters, and even bosses.

  • Steam Workshop integration for sharing your designs and downloading new mods with ease.

  • Rogue mode for an extra challenge, where death is final (optional).

  • ... and more to come!

eXoSpace is a passion project by Fantastimaker, an independent game studio led by a single developer.

name: eXoSpace Combat Engineer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10, 11, or newer
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel 2.0 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB DirectX 9 Graphics Card or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10, 11, or newer
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel 2.5 GHz (or AMD equivalent) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB DirectX 11 Graphics Card or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Design your ship, choose your target, and embark on a hunt through a randomly generated universe. Each hyperjump leads to a new and unexpected encounter, forcing you to make tough choices. What kind of bounty hunter will you become?
